sources.title: Scandalous | Full Urban Drama Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc.  All rights reserved**

Scandalous - In the wake of his grandmother's passing, prominent gym owner Joshua gathers with friends and family to honor her memory, but finds the bittersweet reunion overshadowed by deception and adultery.

2012
Stars: Niesha Bently, Bobbie Johnson, Glenn Plummer

metadata.Plot: An investigative reporter following an espionage story goes to London and gets involved with murder, scam artists and rock concerts.
metadata.Writer: Larry Cohen, Rob Cohen, John Byrum
metadata.Actors: Robert Hays, Ron Travis, M. Emmet Walsh
